Text to display in the widget header. Change using msg.title.

Info text to display in (i) pop-up. Change using msg.popup_info.

Simple key-value pairs to show in table. Change using msg.payload.

Allow editing of the table. Change using msg.editable.

Fields to show in table in order, show all in sorted order if empty. Change using msg.fields.

Send all fields to topic, not just changed ones. Change using msg.send_all.
